Banner.Name: Karthick Sekar
Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience developing web applications, web api's, bots, mobile apps. and technological solutions to make the application a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, Flutter, React Native, .NET Core and sometimes my expertise extends to Restful API development, cloud services such as Azure, AWS, and Google Firebase, as well as MS SQL applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Full Stack Associate Senior Software Developer with 3 years of hands-on experience, I am dedicated to continuous growth and refinement of my skills. Throughout my journey, I have specialized in cross-platform development, mastering technologies such as Angular, .NET Core, Flutter, and React Native. My proficiency extends beyond frontend frameworks to encompass backend development, where I have excelled in utilizing technologies like .NET Core and MS SQL to deliver robust solutions.

In addition to my technical expertise, I have a proven track record of leadership and teamwork. Whether it's writing dynamic code, implementing system improvements, or optimizing sites, I am committed to delivering high-quality solutions that add tangible value to every project.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web development
Description: Proficient in responsive and dynamic cross-platform development, successfully delivering 3 Web App. on time using .Net with Angular technology.
Demonstrated expertise in creating 10+ dynamic reusable components tailored to specific functionalities using Angular.
Experienced in improving performance of Web Application by using various techiques like Lazy loading, Optimize Images and Assets, Minimize HTTP Requests, Server-Side Rendering and Tree Shaking
Implemented Security Best Coding Practices, including OWASP Top 10 Security guidelines, and integrated API Gateway solutions to enhance application security in .NET core Appication.
Implemented various type of login like B2C, Multi tenent authentication, OAuth, Two-Factor Authentication and SSO as well.

Successfully integrated role-based authorization in Angular application, ensuring secure access to features and routes based on user roles through custom route guards and dynamic UI element rendering.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Chatbot development
Experience.Jobs.Technologies: AWS Lex | AWS Lambda function | Angular | .NET Core | Zobot
Description: Conducted a Proof of Concept (POC) on AWS Lex and Zobot, evaluating their capabilities for chatbot development, and selected AWS Lex due to its superior flexibility and customization options.

Integrated AWS Lex into Angular applications, ensuring responsive design and crafting custom user interfaces, and provided comprehensive training to AWS Lex for effectively handling diverse user inputs.

Utilized AWS Lambda functions to enhance the chatbot's flexibility, implementing complex logic dynamically, and interconnected AWS Lex, Lambda, web APIs, and web applications to create a seamless chatbot interaction experience.

Successfully delivered and implemented the chatbot solution across three distinct projects for different clients, tailoring the solution to meet the specific requirements and preferences of each client.

Ensured maximum satisfaction by delivering a chatbot solution that effectively met the unique needs of each client, leveraging AWS Lex, Lambda, and Angular technologies to create an efficient and user-friendly chatbot experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web API
Description: Possess 3 years of extensive experience in developing RESTful APIs.
Implemented Dapper ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) to enhance performance, providing efficient database access and optimized data retrieval.
Developed multi-tenant authentication and Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) flow, ensuring secure access to the API from different tokens.
Implemented advanced security measures for accessing the database, including Managed Identity, Key Vault integration, and adherence to OWASP best practices.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Mobile development
Experience.Jobs.Technologies: Flutter | Google Analytics | Firebase Push notification | Crashlytics | React Native
Description: Designed and developed a mobile app using Flutter, leveraging its cross-platform capabilities to create a seamless user experience.
Implemented OAuth authentication within the Flutter app, ensuring secure access to user accounts.
Integrated Firebase Push Notification and Azure Function App to enable push notification functionality within the mobile app.

Proficient in designing and implementing automated workflows using Azure Logic Apps to streamline social media posting and notification processes, enhancing efficiency and ensuring timely communication with stakeholders.
Utilized Crashlytics and Google Analytics to track usage and performance metrics, optimizing the mobile app based on insights gathered.
Learned and developed three dynamic components for use across projects within the React Native framework, expanding expertise in mobile development technologies.

Experience.Jobs.Title: SQL development
Description: Possess experience in writing stored procedures (SP) and debugging SP to ensure optimal database performance and functionality.
Optimized stored procedures and implemented indexing strategies to improve database query performance and reduce execution time.
Proficient in writing complex SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data efficiently, ensuring effective data management and analysis.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu super plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
